Detailed Description

Knows about time using the clock from RLAlg in the features. Adds a constant to each approximator output based on the clock, and a phase time. Requires number of approximator outputs be a factor of the cycle time.

Constructor, do whatever you need

See header for purpose of this approximator. Always sits on top of another controller that has parameters.

void libpg::CyclicPolicyBias::computeDirection ( int   )  [virtual]

Update the search direction for the parameters from the current gradient and possible past information. For GPOMDP and most codes this is empty. This could hold conjugation code Or it can extract natural actor critic search direction
